e Health Care

E Health Care is the internet based e-health and medical web portal in Bangladesh,We provides a user friendly website design that have doctors site, hospital site, health & medicine site for helpfull information for any kind of patient.

The portal provides you complete and detailed health and medical sector information especially Bangladeshi doctors list, pharmaceuticals info, medical college list, hospitals plus latest health and medical related articles. We have an eye observing the needs of general people who wants the core services from a doctors or any health organization. Youâ€™ll be able to get important health tips and emergency numbers for ambulance as well as find a doctor at your nearest local area to solve your medical problem.
